formattedAddress: 324 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 324 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10023-6074, USA

originalText.text:
I worked with Rachel over the phone to purchase a gift for a friend. She was so lovely.  Rachel texted me pictures of the scarf, wrapped, wrote a note and is delivering locally in Manhattan. She is so easy to work with and the extra added bonus is there's no charge for wrapping/shipping!

Highly recommend. Can't wait to visit the store in person!

originalText.text: This store is amazing!  Liana is a genius.  I told her about the events I had coming up and she picked out wonderfully appropriate and flattering items in exactly my size without me doing any work at all.  I tried things on and she showed me how to improve the looks, tie things correctly, accessorize, etc.  I left with a huge bag of lovely new things.  While I was there, I saw her work happy miracles for other customers as well.  I will never go to a big department store again.

originalText.text:
Liana is an outstanding family establishment which I highly recommend ! Im a professional violinist in NYC, I’m always looking for a classic-clean-stylish-elegant look when I’m performing on or off stage! I recently had a stay-at-home filmed performance which I did for YouTube this summer (July  2020) Liana and her staff helped me pick the perfect outfit which I also used in a photo shoot the next day. Her attention to detail and honesty in helping me make the right decision was much appreciated!
Liana is my #1  go-to place to shop for an exquisite wardrobe. Thank you!

Violinist  on the Upper West Side.

originalText.text: Small but mighty. This small boutique has everything you need from day to dinner to evening gowns. Wide selection of suits and professional pieces too. All the brands you know (Theory, Vince, Rebecca Taylor...) & some others that you don’t (but should!!) Incredibly friendly and helpful staff. It’s a family run business that’s been on the UWS for almost 40 years! Shop here and help them stay in the neighborhood!!

originalText.text: This store has an amazing selection of high end clothes and the staff is so helpful in a very natural way. Not overwhelming sales types at all. Just knowledgeable and helpful.
